title: Gym Manager
desc: A Rust-based gym management system for tracking members, schedules, and billing. Features a CLI for admin tasks and a web interface for members.

title: Portfolio Website
desc: This personal portfolio, built to showcase my projects and skills. Features dynamic content loading with HTMX and styling with Tailwind CSS.

title: E-commerce Analytics Dashboard
desc: A web application for visualizing sales data and customer behavior for an e-commerce platform. Built with React and Chart.js.
